Package com.jalapeno.annotations

Package containing InterSystems Jalapeño Technology Annotations.

See:
          Description

Enum Summary
AccessLevel Specifies access level
AccessType Specifies whether the mappings should be applied to fields (FIELD) or accessors (PROPERTY)
CollectionType Specifies a collection type
FetchType Defines strategies for fetching data from the database
IDType Specifies internal (database) ID type
LobType Specifies a Lob object (stream) type
RelationshipType Specifies a relationship type
 

Annotation Types Summary
Access Provides additional information about access level (e.g.
CacheClass Provides additional information about the target Cache class
CacheProperty Annotation type is be used to specify the corresponding Cache property type and name, as well as the SQL column name
ClassParameter Used to declare class parameters
ClassParameters Used to declare multiple class parameters
Collection Specifies type (ARRAY or LIST), element (base) type and the fetch strategy for the Cache collection
Embeddable Used to mark the class as serial (embeddable)
Extends Extend annotation replaces the default superclass of generated Cache Class.
ID Used to declare a field to be an internal database ID.
Implements adds additional superclasses to Cache projection of the given Java class.
Index Used to create a Cache Index
Indices Used to specify multiple indices on the given Cache class
Lob Lets the Cache class generator know that the annotated property is to be mapped as a Lob type.
ManyToOne Used for specifying Many-To-One relationships in Cache.
OneToMany Used for specifying One-to-Many relationships in Cache.
PropertyParameter Used to declare property parameters (MAXVAL, MINVAL etc)
PropertyParameters Used to declare multiple property parameters
Queries Used to specify multiple Query annotations
Query Used for specifying named queries in Cache.
Relationship Used for specifying relationships in Cache.
Transient Class and Property level annotation.
Version Keeps track of the version property used for optimistic locking
 

Package com.jalapeno.annotations Description

Package containing InterSystems Jalapeño Technology Annotations.

Package contains InterSystems Jalapeño Technology annotations that can be used to specify data model. These annotataions can be used together with and in addition to JPA annotations.
